title: VR-Based Short-Intensive Basic Life Support (BLS) Training

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Utilization of VR simulations to compensate for constraints in face-to-face education during COVID-19.

learning_goals: Learners can achieve no-flow times within 10% during BLS performance through VR simulation
Learners can score over 80 points (out of 100) on BLS performance quality in structured clinical evaluations
Learners can report confidence in BLS skill acquisition at level 4 or higher on a 5-level self-assessment survey
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
